April 20, 1986 D North East Midlands Contest (Third Section)
North East Midlands Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest North East Midlands Contest north-east-midlands-contest-third-section
Bradbury Hall, Chesterfield
Prizes 1st £90, 2nd £65, 3rd £45.
Best euphonium - Lyndon Cooper (Huthwaite)
6 bands competed.
